title: Makar Sankranti
desc: Solar transition celebration. Special prayers and sweets distribution.

title: Vasant Panchami
desc: Saraswati Pooja. Prayers for education and wisdom. Bring your books for blessings.

title: Maha Shivaratri
desc: All-day Abhishekam and overnight vigils for Lord Shiva. Special evening prayers.

title: Holi
desc: Festival of colors. Community celebration and festive lunch.

title: Chaitra Navratri Begins
desc: Start of 9-day spring worship. Ghatasthapana ceremony.

title: Ram Navami
desc: Celebrating the birth of Lord Rama at 12:00 PM.

title: Vaisakhi
desc: Solar New Year celebrations and special prayers.

title: Jagannath Rath Yatra
desc: The grand chariot procession of Lord Jagannath Baladev and Subhadra.

title: Hariyali Teej
desc: Traditional songs and swings for women celebrating Mata Parvati.

title: Raksha Bandhan
desc: Celebrating the bond between siblings. Thread ceremony available.

title: Krishna Janmashtami
desc: Midnight birth celebration with Jhulan ceremony and Dahi Handi.

title: Ganesh Chaturthi
desc: Installation of Lord Ganesha idol and daily Vishesh Aarti.

title: Sharad Navratri Begins
desc: 9 days of Garba Dandiya and nightly Mata Rani worship.

title: Maha Ashtami
desc: The main day of Durga Pooja featuring Kanya Pooja rituals.

title: Dussehra
desc: Vijayadashami celebrations. Victory of good over evil.

title: Karwa Chauth
desc: Evening Vrat Katha and moon sighting ritual for women.

title: Diwali
desc: Festival of Lights. Grand Lakshmi Pooja temple lighting and fireworks.

title: Bhai Dooj
desc: Blessing ceremony for brothers to conclude the Diwali festivities.
